TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlParser extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

span.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser 類別提供方法，可以建立 T:System.Web.UI.Control 控制項或 T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate 介面藉由剖析標記，表示控制項或控制項樣板的字串。The T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser class provides methods that can create a T:System.Web.UI.Control control or T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface by parsing a string of markup representing a control or control template. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得頁面使用控制項的 HTML 標記類別，以及如何使用它的控制項具現化類別。The following code example shows how to get the HTML markup for a control on a page using the class and how to instantiate a control from it using the class. 此範例也示範如何顯示 Microsoft Windows 對話方塊，從設計工具。The example also shows how to display Microsoft Windows dialog boxes from a designer. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.

param.span: An instance that is the designer host for the page.

param.span: The HTML markup for the control.

summary.span: Creates a control from the specified markup using the specified designer host.

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup using the specified designer host.

returns.span: The that *controlText* represents; otherwise, , if the parser cannot build the control.

span.span: The that *controlText* represents; otherwise, , if the parser cannot build the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法存取的字串，表示使用的設計工具主應用程式服務的 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的登錄指示詞。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 透過取得設計工具主應用程式服務屬性物件，或如果未提供，服務。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果剖析器無法建立控制項。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 HTML 標記文字建立控制項。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法存取的字串，表示使用的設計工具主應用程式服務的 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的登錄指示詞。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 透過取得設計工具主應用程式服務屬性物件，或如果未提供，服務。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果剖析器無法建立從控制項`controlText`參數。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the controls from the `controlText` parameter.
